titles.title: No Land Grab Act of 2021
A bill to prohibit certain provisions of an Executive Order relating to land conservation from taking effect, and for other purposes.
No Land Grab Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
No Land Grab Act of 2021
This bill prohibits from having the force and effect of law a provision of Executive Order 14008 (86 Fed. Reg. 7619), titled Tackling the Climate Crisis at Home and Abroad, that requires the Department of the Interior to recommend steps to achieve the goal of conserving at least 30% of U.S. lands and waters by 2030.
